info.name: Firefox 4: Darker Menus and Interface (Grey)
info.description: Changes Firefox 4 so that the interface and menu's are white text, dark grey background and slightly ups the font size. Its perfect for the nighttime internet browser and it looks decent...
info.additionalInfo:
Modded off of "Choose Your Color" http://userstyles.org/styles/33773/firefox-4-choose-your-color
Thanks to Tss for providing a great looking darker interface to work off of

And Thanks to makondo for pointing out that my quickly made style wasn't descriptive enough...
